title: Total player salaries in the sports industry by league 2018/19
yAxis: Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in each Sports League on the y axis.
Sports League NFL has the highest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars and CFL has the lowest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Sports League is 4.9.

max_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Sports League, and Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars in each Sports League on the y axis.
Sports League NFL has the highest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars and CFL has the lowest Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars.
Sports League NFL has 123.5 times more Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars than Sports League CFL which is has the lowest.
Total player salaries in billion U.S. dollars at Sports League NFL is 4.94 , second place is MLB at 3.96, and thirdly is NBA at 3.41.
The Sports League NFL tends to be 3.78 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Sports Leagues, we get total 22.19.
